summary: Jimmy the Tulip's (Bruce Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Matthew Perry), whose wife (Natasha Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Amanda Peet) spring into action.
cast: Bruce Willis|Matthew Perry|Amanda Peet|Kevin Pollak|Natasha Henstridge|Frank Collison|Johnny Messner|Silas Weir Mitchell|Tasha Smith|Elisa Gallay|Tallulah Willis|Johnny Williams|George Zapata|Carlos Zapata|McNally Sagal|Carl Ciarfalio|Doc Duhame|Buck McDancer|Monte Rex Perlin|Ian Quinn|Brad Orrison|Ned Bellamy|Emmett Shoemaker|Lou Beatty Jr.|Lily Kravets|Jessica Flaherty|Caitlin Morrison|Barry Thompson|Amy Pietz|Frank Pesce|Robert Rusler|Irene Lopez|Julie Lott|Paul Cowboy Jr.
title: Más falsas apariencias
